name: Simple Pan-Fried Tofu
author: The Cow
summary: An everyday dish from Hong Kong for those who love the taste of soy sauce. Kids will love the salty fried protein. Serve with rice or eat as a snack!
directions: Place tofu onto a plate and place another plate on top
Set a 3 to 5 pound weight on top
Press tofu for 20 to 30 minutes; drain and discard the accumulated liquid
Cut tofu into 2x4-inch strips about 1/4-inch thick
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in large skillet over medium-low heat
Cook tofu strips in the oil until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes per side
Stack tofu strips horizontally in a dish with sloping sides, like a teacup saucer
Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil in the same skillet
Add green onions; cook and stir until fragrant, 10 to 20 seconds
Spoon green onions over tofu while they are still sizzling
Let sit until tofu soaks up flavors, 3 to 5 minutes
